"昨今のアークスは己をアピールする事を<br>軽視しすぎている！<br>奥ゆかし:
"相手を知る為には、まずは己から。
語らずとも、このアークスカードだけで
互いの事が分かりあえるのだ！"

"ええい、話している内にも
不安が鎌首をもたげてきた！
君、今すぐ編集するのだ！"

"何を、って、決まっているだろう。
アークスカードの編集だ！"

"さあ、さあ、編集したまえ！
そんなに難しい話ではないだろう。
私の不安を払拭してくれ！"

"About the ARKS Card

The \"ARKS Card\" is a card that you can use to introduce yourself with things like your character names, hobbies and so on.

You can make a card that's unique to you by by filling out the free comments and setting a favorite Symbol Art."

"You can edit your card by selecting \"Edit ARKS Card\" from \"Title / ARKS Card\" on the main menu.

Select the section you want to edit, and enter your content."

"Other people's ARKS Cards can be viewed from the Friend List by selecting \"View ARKS Card\".

As a point of note, since the ARKS card can be viewed by your friends or by others, do not enter personal information such as phone numbers or addresses."
